vote.title: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 20-1429, previously approved on September 23, 2020 for contracts related to medical and protective supplies due to COVID-19 with (1) Dallas Symphony Association; (2) Dallas Museum of Art; (3) Dallas Center for the Performing Arts Foundation; (4) Dallas County Heritage Society; (5) Dallas Black Dance; and (6) Sammons Center for the Arts to (a) expand COVID-19 related eligible expenses to also include, but not limited to capital expenditures (i.e. COVID-related facility improvements such as touchless toilets, sinks, paper towel dispensers, Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning system updates etc.), training, social distancing equipment, and related expenses; and (b) allow eligible expenses to include costs incurred between March 1, 2020 to December 30, 2020 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 20-1429, previously approved on September 23, 2020 for contracts related to medical and protective supplies due to COVID-19 with (1) Dallas Symphony Association; (2) Dallas Museum of Art; (3) Dallas Center for the Performing Arts Foundation; (4) Dallas County Heritage Society; (5) Dallas Black Dance; and (6) Sammons Center for the Arts to (a) expand COVID-19 related eligible expenses to also include, but not limited to capital expenditures (i.e. COVID-related facility improvements such as touchless toilets, sinks, paper towel dispensers, Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning system updates etc.), training, social distancing equipment, and related expenses; and (b) allow eligible expenses to include costs incurred between March 1, 2020 to December 30, 2020 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
